sections.heading: DONATIONS OF PRESENT PROPERTYArt
sections.text: 1737. BeneficiariesThe donor may donate any of his present property to both or one of the prospective spouses. The donation may not, however, be made to their common descendants, whether already born or to be born.Acts 2004, No. 619, ยง1, eff. Sept. 1, 2005.
